situation: P regularly had difficulty transitioning from free play to math, causing him to become fidgety and argumentative.
action: Using a countdown timer, transitions were made predictable for P. The class utilized an interactive 'transition jar' containing math games P enjoys, accessible when transitioning smoothly.
effect: The countdown timer helped P manage his expectations around transition times. Access to a transition jar motivated him, resulting in fewer disruptions and more orderly transitions.
topic: Transition Difficulties - Moving between different activities or spaces
